pages.text: By adding $(l:items/arcane_ash)Arcane Ash$() to strengthen its magical properties, $(l:blocks/flowers#cerublossom)Cerublossoms$() as a catalyst and $(l:blocks/flowers#desert_nova)Desert Novas$() to release instability, $(l:blocks/ores#vinteum)Vinteum Dust$() can be put into a purified state with much higher capacity for magic.
